text: RIMM may refer to: * Rambus In-line Memory Module, a packaging for RDRAM * RIMM, former NASDAQ symbol for Research In Motion, a Canadian wireless device company, maker of the BlackBerry. * Eric Rimm, American nutrition scientist * Martin Rimm * Sylvia Rimm (born 1935), American psychiatrist and writer * RIMM RGB, a standard input-referred color image encoding
title: RIMM
